description.value:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You are hit with an unarmed strike or a strike with a non-reach melee weapon.

You break off quills in your attacker's flesh. You deal [[/r 1d8 #piercing]] piercing damage to the triggering creature (basic Reflex save using your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.) On a critical failure, the creature also takes [[/r 1d4 #persistent bleed]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Bleed Damage} as your quills hook into its flesh. At 3rd level, and every 2 levels thereafter, this damage increases by 1d8 and the persistent piercing damage increases by 1.

[[/r ceil(@details.level.value/2)d8 #piercing]]{Levelled} piercing damage

[[/r 1d4+ceil(@details.level.value/2)-1 #persistent bleed]]{Levelled} persistent bleed damage

Note: +1 bonus from Bristle is not added automatically
